forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower is possible early. Sun and clouds mixed. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower is possible early. Partly cloudy. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early then becoming cloudy with periods of rain late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to cloudy skies and rain overnight. Low 41F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy at times with rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds SW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 52F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High around 55F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
